title: ligz
author: ligz
content: Anyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.

comments.author: CGRevu
comments.created_time: July 02, 2023, 06:42:38 AMLast edit: July 02, 2023, 07:33:55 AM by CGRevu
comments.body: Quote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.took out link.

comments.author: ligz
comments.body: Quote from: CGRevu on July 02, 2023, 06:42:38 AMQuote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.Betnomi Sportsbookwebsite works...no one is able to place a bet

comments.author: Poika5
comments.created_time: July 02, 2023, 07:29:05 AMLast edit: July 02, 2023, 12:09:29 PM by Poika5
comments.body: Quote from: CGRevu on July 02, 2023, 06:42:38 AMQuote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.Betnomi SportsbookDid you just use your referral code to promote an insolvent casino?1. Stopped paying customers2. Stopped paying the sports betting provider3. Half of the slots don't work4. Chat moderators left5. Support has gone radio silent

comments.author: CGRevu
comments.body: I thought he couldn't get into the sportsbook. I'll edit my post.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I was curious and tried to register just to ask around on their gambling site's chat but I can't seem to create an account(I even use VPN just in case my country black listed), it kept saying "promo code invalid" or "unsuccessful action". I wonder what's going on, someone on their ANN thread is saying that they owe their odds provider and have blocked them or probably switching to a new odds provider. it would be nice if they could make an announcement regarding this issue.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.        -  Can't you even show a screenshot link for the concern you bring here on the topic you made mate? I don't seem to see any issues.You just said it was a withdrawal issue. That's why you're holding on to the fact that you have a problem with it.How much is the amount you withdraw from betnomi mate? Is it a large amount or just the right amount? or are most slot games no longer working? because I have never experienced playing betnomi so far.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. If it has not been working could mean anything. So narrow your complain down to explain what response you are getting from them when you try to process your action. Or maybe they are having some issues that you need to confirm. Check on their thread to know if they have any issueQuote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMNot just for me but for everyone.How do you know about this? Or you have more than one account and have tried using those accounts.Have you written to the service center?

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: I just registered on Betnomi to gain access to the chat room and from the multiple comments from the user in the group complaining about delayed withdrawal and also that the support not working even though the domain is still active their services have been halted.It's important to know that at this point betnomi is pulling out of business without prior notice to the players, so that is a big red flag.

comments.author: Poika5
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on July 02, 2023, 08:34:02 AMQuote from: ligz on July 02, 2023, 06:34:12 AMAnyone know what is happening with Betnomi?the sportsbook has not been working for over a weekand withdrawals have been pending for even longer. Not just for me but for everyone.        -  Can't you even show a screenshot link for the concern you bring here on the topic you made mate? I don't seem to see any issues.You just said it was a withdrawal issue. That's why you're holding on to the fact that you have a problem with it.How much is the amount you withdraw from betnomi mate? Is it a large amount or just the right amount? or are most slot games no longer working? because I have never experienced playing betnomi so far.You haven't used Betnomi in the past month. QuoteHow do you know about this? Or you have more than one account and have tried using those accounts.Nobody can place a bet since the 25th of June. Here's a picture I took on the 25th:In their ANN thread, you can see other users complain about the same issue.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg62490253#msg62490253QuoteHave you written to the service center?As I said before, the support team is gone.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I'll tag icopress and see if they may be able to provide an update. I don't know how often they talk with betnomi, but maybe they have some information they can share with the community.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: Odusko on July 02, 2023, 08:44:31 AMI just registered on Betnomi to gain access to the chat room and from the multiple comments from the user in the group complaining about delayed withdrawal and also that the support not working even though the domain is still active their services have been halted.It's important to know that at this point betnomi is pulling out of business without prior notice to the players, so that is a big red flag.You don't need to have to register an account there if only to access the chat room, you just click on the chat icon on their site then you will see it, judging by the problems in the ANN thread they also complain a lot about the same even in the chat room, I'm not very active playing on this site but this casino once had a signature campaign on this forum it was discontinued last april and this casino has also been in operation for a long time.If indeed they have left this business they should ask all users to withdraw their money before this business is closed even though the site looks active, I'm sure people who put their trust and put their money there will be worried about long delayed withdrawals, luckily I never trying to put a lot of money on this site. I hope that the support team or part of them will quickly address each case and process the withdrawal.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Odusko on July 02, 2023, 08:44:31 AMI just registered on Betnomi to gain access to the chat room and from the multiple comments from the user in the group complaining about delayed withdrawal and also that the support not working even though the domain is still active their services have been halted.It's important to know that at this point betnomi is pulling out of business without prior notice to the players, so that is a big red flag.how were you able to register? I kept trying earlier but I can't register, I kept getting either "promo code invalid or "unsuccessful action"(check the image below for reference). now I am really curious why I keep getting those messages.

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on July 02, 2023, 09:12:26 AMI'll tag icopress and see if they may be able to provide an update. I don't know how often they talk with betnomi, but maybe they have some information they can share with the community.I last inquired about Betnomi's affairs about a week ago (asking for the funds they owe me for my sig and regarding the case of one user who contacted me). And I made it clear that if my case is not resolved, then I will have to terminate the contract with them (to which their manager answered me that Sorsis will be online soon and all cases will be resolved). To be honest, I have no idea what's going on with the platform itself, but I'll find out what I can (including checking the poker lobby),

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on July 02, 2023, 09:47:44 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on July 02, 2023, 09:12:26 AMI'll tag icopress and see if they may be able to provide an update. I don't know how often they talk with betnomi, but maybe they have some information they can share with the community.I last inquired about Betnomi's affairs about a week ago (asking for the funds they owe me for my sig and regarding the case of one user who contacted me). And I made it clear that if my case is not resolved, then I will have to terminate the contract with them (to which their manager answered me that Sorsis will be online soon and all cases will be resolved). To be honest, I have no idea what's going on with the platform itself, but I'll find out what I can (including checking the poker lobby),Doesn't sound good. Hopefully nothing bad is on the way. It's been a while, they have invested a lot of money, time to build the community. So far, they have a decent fan base too. Even last UCL pool was sponsored by them, the bitcointalk community reward and in many other communities works they did in the past to bring the brand so far. Let's hope they are having some temporary hardship.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: It's sad if they really encounter serious financial troubles as some people above are assuming, because it was one of the very few casinos active on the forum. I hope it's just a temporary issue and they will be back in business very soon.Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 02, 2023, 12:05:05 PMEven last UCL pool was sponsored by them, the bitcointalk community reward and in many other communities works they did in the past to bring the brand so far. The Bundesliga pool too, maybe @Cygan is aware of something btw.

comments.author: Poika5
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on July 02, 2023, 09:47:44 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on July 02, 2023, 09:12:26 AMI'll tag icopress and see if they may be able to provide an update. I don't know how often they talk with betnomi, but maybe they have some information they can share with the community.I last inquired about Betnomi's affairs about a week ago (asking for the funds they owe me for my sig and regarding the case of one user who contacted me). And I made it clear that if my case is not resolved, then I will have to terminate the contract with them (to which their manager answered me that Sorsis will be online soon and all cases will be resolved). To be honest, I have no idea what's going on with the platform itself, but I'll find out what I can (including checking the poker lobby),Thank you for being so transparent with us.By the way, the site went under maintenance at 14:50 (GMT +2):Hopefully, they will come back with a working sportsbook. But it's hard not to worry because there are so many red flags.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on July 02, 2023, 01:15:50 PMIt's sad if they really encounter serious financial troubles as some people above are assuming, because it was one of the very few casinos active on the forum. I hope it's just a temporary issue and they will be back in business very soon.Let's hope it is indeed a maintenance issue but having the issue for week is worrying. Quote from: Poika5 on July 02, 2023, 01:24:56 PMBut it's hard not to worry because there are so many red flags.Sometimes the main provider can create trouble and, in that case, finding a new provider and settle everything takes time. There could be issue with payment services. too.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on July 02, 2023, 09:47:44 AMI last inquired about Betnomi's affairs about a week ago (asking for the funds they owe me for my sig and regarding the case of one user who contacted me). And I made it clear that if my case is not resolved, then I will have to terminate the contract with them (to which their manager answered me that Sorsis will be online soon and all cases will be resolved). To be honest, I have no idea what's going on with the platform itself, but I'll find out what I can (including checking the poker lobby),It’s definitely the case when your just a contractor for them on a program as it’s the case with campaign managers on the forum as it is in this case with Icopress, the information you get is is based on the amount of importance they place on the project you run for them and that explains the rather shabby response from there team. although your expected to know much than the forum users.Still, Betnomi have got a name carved out for themselves on the forum and it would be a shame for them to end it on a bad note which am believing they won’t. In the time being, hope there customers take matters with them in a timely manner.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: Poika5 on July 02, 2023, 01:24:56 PMQuote from: icopress on July 02, 2023, 09:47:44 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on July 02, 2023, 09:12:26 AM......Thank you for being so transparent with us.By the way, the site went under maintenance at 14:50 (GMT +2):Hopefully, they will come back with a working sportsbook. But it's hard not to worry because there are so many red flags.It's the same message for me as well now "Sorry we are down...", and this morning I played a few rounds of Farkle without any problems. I guess it's hard to be calm about this, especially if someone has some balance on the site, but I hope everything will be alright. I don't think it's something serious, Betnomi is around for a long time, they probably have some problems and I guess we will see them online when they fix it.
